original_title: 帰ってきたクラトス先生のプライベートレッスン
overview: Kratos Sensei's private lesson is back! Except this time, since Kratos isn't around to teach, so the great Zelos takes his place! And he brings with him, a special announcement!
title: Tales of Symphonia The Animation: Kaette Kita Kratos-sensei no Private Lesson
